about_the_game:
Game

Ever wondered what it's like to play a monster-catching game set in the heart of Brazil? Kaardik has the answer! Immerse yourself in regions inspired by Brazil's rich flora and fauna, befriend the enchanting creatures called Kaardiks, assemble your dream team, and challenge other skilled trainers to epic battles. Don't miss this chance to embark on an unforgettable adventure towards the top!

Kodumaa

For generations, humans and Kaardiks have peacefully coexisted in the breathtaking Kodumaa region. However, a lurking evil threatens to disrupt the harmony. As a dedicated trainer, you'll unite with others to confront this darkness head-on and protect the region from destruction.

Kaardiks

Young adventurers from the Kaardik world set out on journeys to discover and befriend wild Kaardiks, hoping to make them part of their teams. Proving your prowess as a trainer always involves battles, and the quickest path to recognition lies in defeating the formidable leaders of each region. Only the bravest and strongest earn the right to challenge the mighty King.

A true epic battle with Kaardiks involves much more than simple encounters. Over time, humans learned to engrave enchantments on cards, which, when used with their partner Kaardiks, enable them to unleash diverse and powerful attacks against their opponents. Thus, the magnificent Kaards were born!

Features

Story

Embark on a thrilling journey through Kodumaa, a region inspired by Brazil's mesmerizing fauna and flora. Discover and befriend the captivating creatures known as Kaardiks, form a formidable team, and take on the challenges of defeating gym leaders while combating the spreading evil that threatens the entire world.

Engage in action-packed 2v2 battles featuring exciting new mechanics that make each encounter unique and fun. Combine attacks of different types to unleash powerful combos, utilize skillful Kaards to support your allies during battles, or apply cunning tactics with status-effect Kaards to outwit your opponents. The path to becoming a champion lies in experimenting with various Kaardik combinations and building your dream team!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bits
  • Processor: Intel i3 6100T 3.2Ghz or Similars
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 650 or Similar
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bits
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen™ 5 or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1650 or Similar
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Join the exciting world of Kaardik, a creature collection game. Embark on exciting adventures with your Kaardiks in the fascinating region of Kodumaa. Capture all the Kaardiks, battle with other trainers, and beat the king.
supported_languages: English, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Japanese
